AppDescription: KeePass is a free open source password manager, which helps you to manage your passwords in a secure way.
7-Zip is an Open Source file compression software application.,
Adobe Acrobat Reader allows you read PDF files.,
Firefox is a modern, fast web browser.,
Notepad++ is a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports several languages. Running in the MS Windows environment, its use is governed by GPL License.
